subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: In the eighth inning of Monday night’s loss to the Texas Rangers, Tony La Russa made his 63rd call to the bullpen this month. He then made two more before the game ended.
snippet: In the eighth inning of Monday night’s loss to the Texas Rangers, Tony La Russa made his 63rd call to the bullpen this month. He then made two more before the game ended.
